name: Subsystem: No Dogs In Space
description:
Playing as the back up system on a deep space ship your goal is to restart the reactor during an emergency.  Make it to the other side of the ship by automating your actions to open doors and keep the crew's life support online. *The Record feature  makes this unplayable on HTML as it requires saving files locally.

GoGodotJam

Assets by:

https://quaternius.com/
